parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.02</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2 </name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets given music track event handler. Will overwrite other music event handlers. Use [[addMusicEventHandler]] if you want to stack them. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setMusicEventHandler''' [type, function] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [type, function]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - "MusicStart" or "MusicStop" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> function: [[String]] - script to be executed. Passes params array 0: class name of the sound in [[Description.ext#Music|CfgMusic]], 1: event handler id</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - id of the event handler </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ehID = [[setMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStart", "[[hint]] [[str]] _this"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ehID = [[setMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStop", "[[hint]] [[str]] _this"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addMusicEventHandler]], [[removeMusicEventHandler]], [[playMusic]], [[removeAllMusicEventHandlers]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
